meanings.definition: To form an approximate judgment or opinion regarding the value, amount, size, or nature of something.
meanings.sent1: She was estimating the number of candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: The engineer is estimating the cost of the construction project.
meanings.sent3: While estimating the weight of the puppy, she guessed it to be as heavy as a bag of flour.
meanings.sent4: Estimating the distance to the moon felt like trying to measure the sky.
meanings.sent5: Estimating the time it takes to bake a cake can be tricky without a timer.

meanings.definition: To calculate or determine an approximate value or amount for something.
meanings.sent1: He is estimating the total price of the groceries in his cart.
meanings.sent2: The appraiser is estimating the value of the antique vase.
meanings.sent3: Estimating the number of balloons needed for the party turned into a fun guessing game.
meanings.sent4: Estimating the depth of the ocean is like trying to fathom the unknown.
meanings.sent5: Estimating the calories in a meal can help with maintaining a healthy diet.
